entry.title: Generalizing RBF under Cluster Mempool
entry.summary: The cluster mempool proposal has garnered attention, leading to a more detailed examination in a post focusing on incentive compatibility within the context of Bitcoin's mempool. The extended discussion, as highlighted in the provided [link](https://delvingbitcoin.org/t/mempool-incentive-compatibility/553), delves into the intricacies of ensuring that the incentives align with the overall functionality and security of the mempool. This exploration is particularly pertinent considering the array of questions raised regarding the initial proposal. Furthermore, the subsequent dialogue stemming from this post underscores its relevance and potential impact on refining the concept further. This conversation not only broadens the understanding of the proposed changes but also contributes significantly to the ongoing discourse on optimizing Bitcoin's mempool management through incentive alignment.
